title: Vowel Sound Explorer
description: An interactive MicroSim showing short and long vowel sounds with example words and pictures, helping kindergarten students understand that vowels can make different sounds.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonics
Vowel Sounds
learningObjectives: Understand that vowels can make different sounds
Distinguish between short and long vowel sounds
Associate vowel sounds with example words
Recognize breve and macron notation for vowel sounds
prerequisites: Recognition of vowel letters A, E, I, O, U

controls.label: Short Sounds
controls.description: Switch to short vowel sound mode

controls.label: Long Sounds
controls.description: Switch to long vowel sound mode

controls.label: Vowel Buttons
controls.description: Click any vowel to hear its sound

assumptions: User has mouse or touchscreen input
limitations: Simplified to two sounds per vowel (actual vowels have more variations)
Speech synthesis quality varies by browser
Long vowel explanation may require teacher scaffolding
